full_summary:
## Tender Announcement: Construct Berlin Wall 402
### At a Glance

* **Project Ref. ID:** PW-22-01005455
* **Solicitation No.:** 30003352
* **Closing Date:** September 13, 2022, 1:00:00 PM AST
* **Contracting Entity:** Fisheries and Oceans Canada
* **Notice URL:** [Attachments included](#Attachments)

### Tender Description

Fisheries and Oceans Canada invites bids to construct a Berlin Wall on Quay 402, located at Howard's Cove Harbour in O'Leary, Prince Edward Island. The project involves the supply and installation of materials and equipment necessary for the construction of the wall.

### Scope of Work

The scope of work includes the supply and installation of the following:

* H-Piles
* Precast concrete wall panels
* Steel tie-rods
* Concrete anchor blocks
* Precast concrete slab
* Galvanized steel ladders
* Holdfasts
* Grab bars
* Wheel guards
* Electrical improvements within the work area

The contract includes mobilization and demobilization of all necessary equipment to make progress on the project. The contractor must also adhere to environmental controls and associated items in accordance with the specifications and drawings.

### Tendering Procedure

This is a two-phase selection process. The first phase will evaluate the qualifications of all bidders, and the second phase will invite qualified bidders to provide a financial bid on the project based on the specifications and drawings. The pre-qualification list will be terminated upon award of the contract in Phase Two, and no additional contracts will be awarded.

### Important Dates

* **Tender Posting Date:** August 26, 2022
* **Amendment Date:** September 2, 2022
* **Expected Contract Start Date:** N/A
* **Expected Contract End Date:** N/A

### Attachment

The following document attachments are included with this tender announcement:

* [Request for Qualification – Howard’s Cove PEI – Berlin Wall 402](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/08/26/73bf77097f24c399aa7b7458a878e318/30003352_-_request_for_qualification_-_howards_cove_pei_-_berlin_wall_402_en.pdf)
* [Addendum 1](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/09/
